subject: Football
Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: David Jacobs, who was sentenced to probation on Thursday for distributing steroids and H.G.H., said he advised about 10 N.F.L. players on gaming the league’s drug-testing policy.
snippet: David Jacobs, who was sentenced to probation on Thursday for distributing steroids and H.G.H., said he advised about 10 N.F.L. players on gaming the league’s drug-testing policy.
